title: BANS
body: who are the people who ban people  in LOL and how do we get our account back?

replies.body:
If you want to appeal a punishment you can submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Punishments will only be removed/reduced if they were made in error.

If your account has been permanently suspended (and the punishment was not in error) there is no way to get the account back.

If you want community feedback on a punishment or more context on the punishment system, you can post details of your punishment and/or your reform card here on boards.
